description: Nothing goes better with lamb than minted mushy peas. Find out for yourself with this lamb chop recipe that features this wonderful flavour combination.
keywords: Lamb Chops With Minted Mushy Peas & Pickled Onion
name: Lamb Chops With Minted Mushy Peas & Pickled Onion Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Pick leaves from remaining mint sprigs. Drain onion. Divide mushy peas and lamb among plates. Top with onion, feta, almonds, mint leaves and reserved peas. Season with pepper and serve.
